Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the glycosyl hydrolase 18 family Chitinase (class
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Fungi:Aspergillus niger, Alternaria alternata, Hordeum sativum.
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Has antifungal activity. Inhibited by divalent metal ions. Maximum inhibition observed with Ca2+ while the least inhibition was observed with Fe2+. Inhibited by high concentrations of GlcNAc.
Sequence Information.Catalytic activity: Random hydrolysis of N-acetyl-beta-D-glucosaminide (1->4)-beta-linkages in chitin and chitodextrins.
Sequence Information.Biophysicochemical properties: pH dependence (Optimum pH is 6-8. There is a 37.7% decrease in activity at pH 5 and a 39.8% decrease in activity at pH 9); Temperature dependence (Optimum temperature is 35 degrees Celsius).

Literature.Title: Extracellular production of chitinase by Streptomyces venezuelae.
Literature.Author: Mukherjee G.

Literature.Title: Purification, characterization, and antifungal activity of chitinase from Streptomyces venezuelae P(10).
Literature.Author: Mukherjee G, Sen SK.
